BaseAttachedProperty.cs
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 namespace Fasetto.Word
2 {
3  using System;
4  using System.Windows;
5 
6  /// <summary>
7  /// A base attached property to replace the M$ way to do this
8  /// </summary>
9  /// <typeparam name="TParent">The parent class to the attached property</typeparam>
10  /// <typeparam name="TProperty">The type of this attached property</typeparam>
11  public abstract class BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>
12  where TParent : new()
13  {
14  #region Public Properties
15 
16  /// <summary>
17  /// Gets the singleton instance of the parent class
18  /// </summary>
19  public static TParent Instance { get; private set; } = new TParent();
20 
21  #endregion Public Properties
22 
23  #region Attached Property Definitions
24 
25  /// <summary>
26  /// The attached property for this class
27  /// </summary>
28  public static readonly DependencyProperty ValueProperty = DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("Value", typeof(TProperty), typeof(BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>), new UIPropertyMetadata(default(TProperty), new PropertyChangedCallback(OnValuePropertyChanged), new CoerceValueCallback(OnValuePropertyUpdated)));
29 
30  /// <summary>
31  /// The callback event when the <see cref="ValueProperty"/> is changed
32  /// </summary>
33  /// <param name="d">The UI element that had its property changed</param>
34  /// <param name="e">The arguments for the event</param>
35  private static void OnValuePropertyChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)
36  {
37  // Call the parent function
38  (Instance as BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>)?.OnValueChanged(d, e);
39 
40  // Call event listeners
41  (Instance as BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>)?.ValueChanged(d, e);
42  }
43 
44  /// <summary>
45  /// The callback event when the <see cref="ValueProperty"/> is changed, even it is the same value
46  /// </summary>
47  /// <param name="d">The UI element that had its property changed</param>
48  /// <param name="value">The arguments for the event</param>
49  private static object OnValuePropertyUpdated(DependencyObject d, object value)
50  {
51  //Call the parent function
52  (Instance as BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>)?.OnValueUpdated(d, value);
53 
54  //Call the event listeners
55  (Instance as BaseAttachedProperty<TParent, TProperty>)?.ValueUpdated(d, value);
56 
57  //Return the value
58  return value;
59  }
60 
61  /// <summary>
62  /// Gets the attached property value
63  /// </summary>
64  /// <param name="d">The element to get the property from</param>
65  /// <returns>The value of the attached property</returns>
66  public static TProperty GetValue(DependencyObject d) => (TProperty)d.GetValue(ValueProperty);
67 
68  /// <summary>
69  /// Sets the attached property
70  /// </summary>
71  /// <param name="d">The element to set the property for</param>
72  /// <param name="value">The value to set the property to</param>
73  public static void SetValue(DependencyObject d, TProperty value) => d.SetValue(ValueProperty, value);
74 
75  #endregion Attached Property Definitions
76 
77  #region Public events
78 
79  /// <summary>
80  /// This fires when the value changes
81  /// </summary>
82  public event Action<DependencyObject, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs> ValueChanged = (sender, e) => { };
83 
84  /// <summary>
85  /// This fires when the value changes, even when the value is the same
86  /// </summary>
87  public event Action<DependencyObject, object> ValueUpdated = (sender, value) => { };
88 
89  #endregion Public events
90 
91  #region Event Methods
92 
93  /// <summary>
94  /// The method that is called when any attached property of this type is changed
95  /// </summary>
96  /// <param name="sender">The UI element that this property was changed for</param>
97  /// <param name="e">The arguments for this event</param>
98  public virtual void OnValueChanged(DependencyObject sender, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)
99  {
100  }
101 
102  /// <summary>
103  /// The method that is called when any attached property of this type is changed, even if the
104  /// value is the same
105  /// </summary>
106  /// <param name="sender">The UI element that this property was changed for</param>
107  /// <param name="value">The arguments for this event</param>
108  public virtual void OnValueUpdated(DependencyObject sender, object value)
109  {
110  }
111 
112  #endregion Event Methods
113  }
114 }
